body_html:
As far as I know, TensorFlow 1.11 and 1.12 only officially supports CUDA 9 right now (see https://www.tensorflow.org/install/gpu). Please consider upgrading your CUDA version or reverting to TF 1.10 in your container. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Since TF team doesn't support older CUDA versions, I'm closing this issue. You can also ask a question on Stack Overflow, where it's more likely to get community attention.

Since TF team doesn't support older CUDA versions, I'm closing this issue. You can also ask a question on Stack Overflow, where it's more likely to get community attention.
body:
As far as I know, TensorFlow 1.11 and 1.12 only officially supports CUDA 9 right now (see https://www.tensorflow.org/install/gpu). Please consider upgrading your CUDA version or reverting to TF 1.10 in your container. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Since TF team doesn't support older CUDA versions, I'm closing this issue. You can also ask a question on [Stack Overflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow), where it's more likely to get community attention.
